1. Alibaba’s Taobao shopping app launches AI-powered English version in Singapore, jumps to first place in Apple’s App Store  CNBC
  2. Alibaba Dropped The AI-Powered English Version Of Taobao In This Country, App Quickly Soars To The Top Of The Charts In No Time  Benzinga
  3. The Wait is Over: Taobao's First-Ever English Interface Launches in Singapore, Unlocking Endless Shopping Possibilities  Yahoo Finance
  4. Singapore shoppers can now shop on Taobao’s app with English interface  The Independent
  5. Taobao Rolls out AI-Powered Eng Version in SG, Tops App Store  AASTOCKS.com

item.title: Kirk Herbstreit Called Out Al Michaels Over Concerns A.I. Would 'get into our brains' - Sports Illustrated
item.description:
